statements: SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE itinerary_id = 1;
SELECT itinerary_name, starting_location, destination_location FROM travel_itineraries WHERE cultural_site IS NULL;
SELECT itinerary_name, destination_location FROM travel_itineraries WHERE starting_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE starting_location = 'Paris' AND destination_location = 'Rome';
SELECT itinerary_name FROM travel_itineraries WHERE starting_location <> destination_location;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE itinerary_id = 1;
SELECT itinerary_name, starting_location, destination_location FROM travel_itineraries WHERE itinerary_id > 2;
SELECT itinerary_name, cultural_site FROM travel_itineraries WHERE destination_location = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE starting_location LIKE '%New%' AND cultural_site IS NOT NULL;
SELECT itinerary_id, itinerary_name FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY itinerary_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, end_date, cultural_site_id FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT * FROM cultural_sites WHERE entry_fee < 50;
SELECT site_name, location, opening_hours FROM cultural_sites;
SELECT itinerary_id, itinerary_name, start_date, end_date, c.site_name FROM travel_itineraries t INNER JOIN cultural_sites c ON t.cultural_site_id = c.site_id;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE cultural_site_id = 5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT t.itinerary_id, t.itinerary_name, c.site_name FROM travel_itineraries t JOIN cultural_sites c ON t.cultural_site_id = c.site_id WHERE c.location = 'Europe';
SELECT t.*, c.site_name, c.entry_fee FROM travel_itineraries t LEFT JOIN cultural_sites c ON t.cultural_site_id = c.site_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_itineraries FROM travel_itineraries WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT itinerary_name, cultural_site FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY itinerary_name ASC;
SELECT site_id, location FROM cultural_sites WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT itinerary_id, site_id, day, time FROM itinerary_schedule WHERE day BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM itinerary_schedule WHERE itinerary_id = 1 ORDER BY day DESC, time ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT id, itinerary_name FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT itinerary_name, cultural_site FROM travel_itineraries WHERE cultural_site = 'Machu Picchu';
SELECT * FROM cultural_sites WHERE location = 'Rome';

SELECT t.id, t.itinerary_name, c.site_name, c.location FROM travel_itineraries t JOIN itinerary_schedule s ON t.id = s.itinerary_id JOIN cultural_sites c ON c.id = s.site_id ORDER BY t.itinerary_name ASC, s.day DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT itinerary_name, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM cultural_sites WHERE location = 'Europe';
SELECT itinerary_id, COUNT(site_id) AS num_sites FROM itinerary_sites GROUP BY itinerary_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT itinerary_id, itinerary_name, start_date, end_date, cultural_sites FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT travel_itineraries.itinerary_name, cultural_sites.site_name, itinerary_sites.visit_date FROM travel_itineraries JOIN itinerary_sites ON travel_itineraries.itinerary_id = itinerary_sites.itinerary_id JOIN cultural_sites ON itinerary_sites.site_id = cultural_sites.site_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'user_%';

SELECT itinerary_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sites FROM travel_itineraries JOIN itinerary_sites ON travel_itineraries.itinerary_id = itinerary_sites.itinerary_id GROUP BY itinerary_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT id, name, start_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, location FROM cultural_sites ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM itinerary_cultural_sites WHERE itinerary_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, description FROM cultural_sites WHERE location = 'Europe';
SELECT id, name FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;

SELECT users.username, travel_itineraries.name FROM users INNER JOIN user_itineraries ON users.id = user_itineraries.user_id INNER JOIN travel_itineraries ON user_itineraries.itinerary_id = travel_itineraries.id;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM cultural_sites;
